snippet: Victor Oladipo and Nikola Vucevic led the Orlando Magic to an 83-77 victory over the Nets, who have lost nine straight home games.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Orlando Magic defeat Brooklyn Nets, 83-77; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Victor Oladipo and Nikola Vucevic led the Orlando Magic to an 83-77 victory over the Nets, who have lost nine straight home games.

headline.print_headline: Magic Send the Nets to Their Ninth Straight Defeat at Home
headline.main: Magic Send the Nets to Their Ninth Straight Defeat at Home
